title: [Question] Any fresher from PESU RR looking for PG? Lets meet and decide together on monday... It would be better if all PG roommates are from same clg( I am from AIML branch).

comments.body: I will discuss with my parents and let u know bro , 2.2 lakhs for hostel is a lot
Yeah man, 22 thousands per month is almost my fathers salary. ðŸ˜‚
Also its not even near the campus
Yeah we have to wait till the clg buses move,its a complete time waste.

Yes, Logic says the cost is due to transport cost included in it. ( Hostel 1.7 + 0.5 for transport). It is very high. Also Bangalore traffic shall ruin the life. Let me also know if you are able to identify a good accommodation nearby

And that hostel is not even like a hostel bruhh
2.2 lakh for shit nahhhh
